import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, ListGroupItem, FormGroup, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import "./booking.css"; const Booking = ({ tour, avgRating }) => { const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userId: "01", userEmail: "shahen@gmail.com", fulName: "", phone: "", guestSize: 1, bookAt: "", }); const { price, reviews } = tour; const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev => ({ ...prev, [e.target.id]: e.target.value })); }; ///! return (

${price} /per person/

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating}({reviews?.length})
{/*//! ============= BOOKING FORM ============= */}
Information
{/*//! ============= BOOKING FORM END ============= */} {/*//! ============= BOOKING BOTTOM ============= */}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
$10
Total
$109
{/*//! ============= BOOKING BOTTOM END ============= */}
); }; export default Booking;
